world.scenery

Class Tree

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.scenery.Scenery
      • world.scenery.Tree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InteractiveObject, AlpineTundraTheme, CaveTheme, PolarDesertTheme, SavannaTheme, SteppeTheme, TaigaTheme, TemperateBroadleafTheme, XericShrublandsTheme

    public class Tree
extends Scenery
implements InteractiveObject, TemperateBroadleafTheme, TaigaTheme, AlpineTundraTheme, SteppeTheme, CaveTheme, PolarDesertTheme, XericShrublandsTheme, SavannaTheme
    Class used to handle a tree object

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isTraversable()
      Returns true if the player is able to pass through the object and false if the player is not able to cross the object
      void playerEnter()
      Method to be called when the player was near and is now over the object
      void playerLeave()
      Method to be called when the player was over and is now near the object
